title: Update No-modal copy and swap angry cat image for angry panda

requirements.summary: Remove the cat side-eye line from the LastChanceNoModal description without leaving empty spacing.
acceptanceCriteria: When the No modal is opened, the text "That cat is giving you the side-eye right now..." is not present in the DOM or visible UI.
No extra blank spacing/empty paragraph is left where the removed line used to be.

file_operations.description:
Remove the specific user-facing paragraph that contains "That cat is giving you the side-eye right now..." and ensure the DialogDescription layout does not leave an empty

or visual gap where it was.

requirements.summary: Replace the No modal angry cat image with the generated angry panda asset and update related text/alt text to reference a panda.
acceptanceCriteria: The No modal image is loaded from a panda asset under /assets/generated/ and no longer references /assets/generated/angry-sideeye-cat.dim_768x768.png.
The image alt text (and any other user-facing references in the modal) refers to a panda, not a cat.
The modal still renders correctly (image sizing/spacing preserved) and the primary/secondary buttons continue to function as before.

file_operations.description: Add the newly generated image asset required by the BuildRequest: frontend/public/assets/generated/angry-sideeye-panda.dim_768x768.png.

Update the modal image src to point to /assets/generated/angry-sideeye-panda.dim_768x768.png, update the image alt text to refer to a panda (not a cat), and adjust any other user-facing cat references in this modal (e.g., the title emoji/text) while preserving existing sizing/spacing classes and button behaviors.
